final.step_contents:
Pay attention to astronomers’ predictions on any possible collisions with earth.
Move away from coastal areas.
Move into a bunker or fortified structure and outfit it with an energy source.
Purchase enough food, water, medicine, and other supplies.
Buy weapons and ammunition for after the impact.
Keep your mind active and stay mentally healthy.

item: Move into a bunker or fortified structure and outfit it with an energy source.
the best ones for a comet impact will have an air filtration system and be made of strong material.
Purchase enough food, water, medicine, and other supplies.
Buy weapons and ammunition for after the impact.
make sure that you have things like food, water, and shelter before spending money on protection
Pay attention to astronomers’ predictions on any possible collisions with earth.
Keep your mind active and stay mentally healthy.

bunker: Move into a bunker or fortified structure and outfit it with an energy source.
the best ones for a comet impact will have an air filtration system and be made of strong material.
energy_source: When the comet hits, dust, soot, and water will shoot up into our atmosphere, making it cold for months to years.[7] For that reason, make sure you also outfit your bunker with an energy source for heat, like a generator and enough fuel to last while the dust in the atmosphere settles.
pistol: A semi-automatic rifle and a pistol with enough ammunition should be more than enough firepower.
ammunition: A semi-automatic rifle and a pistol with enough ammunition should be more than enough firepower.
market: Purchase enough food, water, medicine, and other supplies.
weapon_market: Buy weapons and ammunition for after the impact.
